messages.content: What is ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG and what does it do?
ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is an unofficial extension of the BRIA Background Removal v1.4 model for ComfyUI. It allows users to remove the background from images and videos using the RMBG model.
Yes, ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is open-source and its source code is available on GitHub.
What is the current version of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
The current version of ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG is V1.5.
What are the new features in V1.5?
V1.5 includes support for batch processing and a new feature to output mask.
ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG can be installed using the ComfyUI Manager (under development) or manually by following the steps provided in the documentation.
How do I use the nodes in ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG?
After installing the extension, the nodes to use are: BRIA_RMBG Model Loader (which automatically loads the Removal v1.4 model) and BRIA RMBG (for removing the background).
What does the BRIA_RMBG Model Loader node do?
The BRIA_RMBG Model Loader node automatically loads the Removal v1.4 model for use in ComfyUI-BRIA_AI-RMBG.
What is the purpose of the BRIA RMBG node?
The BRIA RMBG node is used for removing the background from images and videos using the RMBG model.
